dcterms:creator: M. Marcus
G. Kim
M. A. Marcinkiewicz
R. MacIntyre
A. Bies
M. Ferguson
K. Katz
B. Schasberger
dcterms:description: The Penn Treebank (PTB) dataset is used for next word prediction tasks in language modeling, demonstrating significant improvements in perplexity over traditional N-gram models.
dcterms:title: Penn Treebank (PTB) dataset

dcterms:creator: D. Rawlinson
A. Ahmed
G. Kowadlo
dcterms:description: The Stochastic Sequential MNIST (ssMNIST) dataset is a partially observable sequence learning task involving higher-order sequences of MNIST digits, requiring the model to learn to ignore non-predictive sub-sequence order.
dcterms:title: Stochastic Sequential MNIST (ssMNIST)
